title: What are Takamine guitars made of? - Quora

response.answer_text: Takamine is made in China, and Nato wood, is used on Takamine guitars Nato wood is a collective name for wood from Mora trees (the best-known species are Mora excelsa (Mora) and Mora gonggrijpii (Morabukea). That is what gives them their unique sound. David Gilmore (of Pink Floyd) uses them and after hearing his sound. I got one myself.

Takamine has really good stuff and really bad stuff. The material with which they are made coincides with the quality of the guitar. Since they have so many models it would be a lesson in futility to try and name every material they use.
